16241.「おひさしぶりです <pc>さん。\n あなたも この作戦に参加なさるのですね！:
Long time no see <pc>. I see that you
are also taking part in this mission!

16242.「……なんだよ 忘れちまったのか？\n 前に 敵のアジトに取り残されていた\n:
What, have you forgotten? The last time you
saved our lives, we were stranded in an enemy
hideout.

16243.「今回は 前のような みっともないところは\n 見せませんよ。ガズバランの牙の連:
This time, we will not show the same
deplorable behavior as before. We will catch
every last Gazbalan's Fang with our own hands!

16244.「そういうワケで お先に失礼するぜ！: So, if you'll excuse me, I have to go!

16245.兵士たちは だんろの奥に もぐっていった。: The soldiers went deep into the cellar.

16246.「しょせんは チンピラ風情か。\n 相手になんねーな。:
You're just a punk at heart. I can't deal with
them.

16247.「残るは お前たち ふたりだけだ。\n おとなしく降伏すれば 悪いようにはしない:
You two are all that's left. Surrender quietly
and we won't hold it against you!

16248.「ふたりだけ…… 何を言ってるんです？\n 私たちが ふたりだけのはずないでしょ:
Just the two of us... What are you talking
about? What are you talking about? We can't be
the only two. Hey, Mr. Pyuju?

16249.「あはは～ そうだね～。\n この人たちに 現実を教えてあげないとね♪:
Haha~ You're right~. I have to give these
people a reality check... ♪

16252.「人形と 入れ替わってるのが\n スピンドルだけと 誰が言いました？:
Who says it's only Spindle that was
replaced by a doll?

16253.「私が ガートラント城下町で どれだけ\n チョコ神ぬいぐるみを バラまいたと？:
Do you know how many Choco-God Plushies I've
scattered around Gartlant Castle Town? There's
been a lot of turnover in the castle!

16254.「おや？ これは これは <cs_pchero>さん。\n ごぶさたしております:
Hmm? Well, well, well <cs_pchero>. It's been
a while. Thank you so much for your help back
then.

16255.「おひさしぶり～♪ \n ボクのこと 覚えてるか～い？: Long time no see....... Remember me?

16256.「……そういえば あなたは グロスナー王と\n 親しくされているようですなぁ。:
By the way, you seem to be very close to King
Grossner.

16257.「本当なら 恩人である あなたとは\n 争いたくは ないのですが……\n あの大:
I really don't want to fight with you, my
benefactor, but I can't allow you to take the
side of that great sinner.

16258.「この ガズバランの牙の首領 ザッケスが\n 天罰を下してさしあげましょう！:
Let this Gazbalan's Fang chieftain, Zackes,
bring down damnation upon you!

16259.「さあ 我が兵士たちよ！\n ガートラント王家に与する罪人を\n 裁くのだぁっ！:
Come, my soldiers! Bring to justice the Sinner
who has given his life for the Gartlant royal
family!

16262.「おや おや <cs_pchero>さん！\n あれだけ ひどい目にあっておいて:
Well, well, well. <cs_pchero>! I'm surprised
to see you back here again after all the
trouble you've been through.

16263.「この人は とにかく しつこいんだよね～。\n ちょっとやそっとじゃ あきらめな:
She's a persistent one anyway! He might not
give up just a little bit.

16264.「……ならば その心が折れるまで\n 何度でも たたきのめすまでですよ。\n フ:
If that's the case, I'll beat you to a pulp as
many times as I have to until your heart
breaks. Hmph. It's like a skill.

16265.「さあ 我が兵士たちよ！\n ガートラント王家に与する罪人を\n 裁くのだぁっ！:
Come, my soldiers! Bring to justice the Sinner
who has given his life for the Gartlant royal
family!

16267.「あはは～。とっても 楽しかったよ。\n とりあえず 今回は これで失礼するね♪:
Ha-ha-ha~. It was a lot of fun. I'll leave you
with this for now.

16268.「……せっかくですから\n グロスナー王に 伝えておいてください。:
...since you're here, please tell King
Grossner that I'm here.

16269.「ガズバランの剣の遺志を継ぐ者として\n 私は 必ずや 退廃したガートラント王家:
As the heir to the legacy of the sword of
Gazbalan, I will surely defeat the decadent
royal house of Gartlant!

16271.「ぬいぐるみ屋 ザッケス……あの男が\n ガズバランの牙のリーダーなのですね。\:
Plushie shop Zackes...that man is the leader
of Gazbalan's Fang.... I must report this to
King Grossner...

16272.「オレたちは 先に 城に戻っておくぜ。\n ……ああ キズの方は 大丈夫。\n:
We'll go back to the castle first. Oh, the
wound is fine. I'm not going to go to sleep
over this.

16273.「それでは 失礼します。\n 本当に ありがとうございました。: Now, if you'll excuse me. Thank you very much.

16274.「話は すでに デオルドたちから聞いておる。\n 今回も ご苦労だったな <pc:
I have already heard from Deold and the
others. Thank you again for your efforts
<pc>.

16275.「まずは お前さんの活躍に報いよう。\n 心ばかりの礼の品じゃ。受け取るがよい。:
First of all, I would like to reward you for
your service. Here is a small token of my
appreciation.

16276.「しかし 魔物との入れ替わりが\n 兵士たちにまで 及んでいようとは……\n 恐:
But the fact that the replacement of the
soldiers by monsters has turned out to be
exactly what I had feared.

16277.「<pc>さんが 倒した兵士は\n やはり ニセモノだったようです。\n 本物の:
It seems that the soldier that <pc>
defeated was a fake after all. The real
soldier was found in the castle warehouse.

16278.「彼らは いずれも チョコ神ぬいぐるみを\n 持っていたそうです。こうなったら:
They all had Choco-God Plushies. Now we have
to find every last one of those who were
replaced in the castle!

16279.「よせ マグナス！ \n そんなことをすれば 魔女狩りが起こる。\n それよりも:
No, Magnus! You do this, there will be a witch
hunt. Instead, what we need to do right now is
cut off the source of the problem.

16280.「元凶……ですか。ガズバランの牙には\n ピュージュという魔物が 協力していると:
The source...? I heard that a monster named
Pyuju is helping Gazbalan's Fang. If we can
just get rid of that thing...

16281.「それと ガズバランの牙の首領を名乗る\n ザッケスだな。このふたりが 今回の事:
And Zackes, who calls himself the leader of
Gazbalan's Fang. I think it's safe to say that
these two are the ringleaders of this case.

16282.「そのザッケスですが ガズバランの剣の\n 遺志を継ぐ者だと 名乗ったそうですね:
This Zackes, I understand, claims to be the
heir to the legacy of the sword of Gazbalan.
The Sword of Gazbalan, if I may say so...

16283.「ここにいる者には 語っておかねば\n なるまいな。\n 我が生涯 最大の後悔を:
I have to tell those of you who are here. The
biggest regret of my life...

16284.「ほんの 十数年前 このガートラントでも\n オーガ本来の 厳しい生き方を\n:
Just a few decades ago, there was a great deal
of activity in Gartlant to restore the
original, hard way of life of the ogre.

16285.「その中心となったのが わしの息子\n デルタニスと その親友であり\n 当時の:
At the center of it all was my son Deltanis
and his close friend and Soldier To Be at the
time, Zexen.

16286.「ふたりは 同じ志を持つ仲間を集めて\n ガズバランの剣という組織を作り上げ\n:
They gathered like-minded companions to form
an organization called the Sword of Gazbalan,
and worked day and night in rigorous training.

16287.「だが 彼らは 純粋すぎた。\n その修行は 次第に エスカレートしていき\n:
But they were too pure. Their practice
escalated and became extremely dangerous.

16288.「わしは 何度も デルタニスをいさめたが\n あやつは 聞こうとはせんかったよ。:
I repeatedly badgered Deltanis, but he
wouldn't listen to me. And then... it
happened.

16289.「デルタニスを含めた 数人の若者が\n 過激な修行の末に 命を落とすという\n:
It was a tragic accident in which several
young men, including Deltanis, lost their
lives in the extreme practices.

16290.「わしは すぐに ガズバランの剣を解散させ\n 以後 この国では 危険な修行を禁:
I immediately disbanded the Sword of Gazbalan and thereafter issued an order forbidding any dangerous practices in this country...I had
to.

16291.「従わぬ者には 厳しい罰を下すことさえした。\n ゼクセンをはじめ ガズバランの:
They even imposed harsh punishments on those who disobeyed. Many members of the Sword of Gazbalan, including Zexen, were exiled from
the country.

16292.「もっと早く 彼らの暴走を止めることが\n できていれば……。\n それだけが:
If only I had been able to stop their rampage
earlier, that is the only thing I regret now.

16293.「遺志を継ぐと言うからには ザッケスという男\n ガズバランの剣と ゆかりのある:
Since he claims to be carrying on the legacy, this man Zackes must have been associated with the sword of Gazbalan. No wonder he has a
grudge against me.

16294.「まさか 今になって 過去の亡霊と\n 対面することになろうとはな……。:
I never thought I would come face to face with
the ghosts of the past...
